channel.title: Deadman Mocroscape Server [ORION 06 + UNIQUE DATABASE] HELP US BECOME BIG [BETA]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://scape.mocro.net/img/logo.png[/img]
[url=http://mocro.net/forum/]Mocro.net - Where Gamers Unite[/url] [url=http://scape.mocro.net/]MocroScape - Deadman Mode #1 Server[/url]
http://youtu.be/0rYyxt_Cx70[/CENTER]
Looking for a fresh unique gaming experience? Support Mocroscape We need your help! Mocroscape will be a server that will be known and will be loved for its innovativeness, we have enough boring servers. Time for some real fun. We are not scared to expand our boundaries. Come with ideas/suggestions, if it works we'll make it work. The community makes the server and we need every single one of your help to make this a succesful server. So [B]every[/B] help is welcome, all the feedback positive or negative is appreciated. Frequent updates. Give us a chance and please be patient with us.
Featuring:
[ul][*]NO 13 year old mods [*]ALMOST ALL AGILITY SHORTCUTS FIXED! [*]WHEN YOUR STUNNED OR FROZEN YOU CANT USE SHORTCUT. [*]F SHORTKEYS!(F1-F9) [*]Starteritem 1 per computer [*]starteritem 5 per ip [*]you cannot trade yourself [*]you cannot fight yourself [*]Muiling is not aloud![/ul]
[ul][*]3 SECOND DELAY FOR NON SKULL [*]10 SECOND DELAY FOR SKULL[/ul]
[ul][*]Protect 2 combat skills. [*]All skiller skills are protected.[/ul]
[ul][*]IN COMBAT DROPPING NOT ALOUD![/ul]
Custom Skilling Pets:
[ul][*]-Woodcutting [*]-Smithing [*]-Firemaking [*]-Cooking [*]-Herblore [*]-Prayer[/ul]
Custom Npc Drop pets:
[ul][*]Dwarf [*]Imp [*]Blue dragon [*]Rock Crab [*]Black dragon [*]More to come![/ul]
[ul][*]Kill Death Counter. [*]Clue scroll counter. [*]Santa Event [*]x50 Exp Rate [*]Target Training for combat and range. [*]Protect skills at nurse Sarah [*]safe Deposit box is at Niles. [*]Rules that will be changed upon time, example: if clans will become a problem we will do something about it. [*]Using Database for all players info! [*]Auto Backup every day! [*]You can hold up 4 Keys. [*]when skulled and more then 2 keys announcement will be made.[/ul]
[url=http://mocro.net/forum/]Mocro.net - Where Gamers Unite[/url] [url=http://scape.mocro.net/]MocroScape - Deadman Mode #1 Server[/url]
Progress: [SPOILER=Server Media][CENTER] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/e51d30463480d5eeced346922215a184.png[/img]

item.description:
@Mocro.net wrote:

[CENTER]

Mocro.net - Where Gamers Unite
MocroScape - Deadman Mode #1 Server

http://youtu.be/0rYyxt_Cx70[/CENTER]

Looking for a fresh unique gaming experience? Support Mocroscape We need your help! Mocroscape will be a server that will be known and will be loved for its innovativeness, we have enough boring servers. Time for some real fun. We are not scared to expand our boundaries. Come with ideas/suggestions, if it works we’ll make it work. The community makes the server and we need every single one of your help to make this a succesful server. So every help is welcome, all the feedback positive or negative is appreciated. Frequent updates. Give us a chance and please be patient with us.

Featuring:

[ul][]NO 13 year old mods
[]ALMOST ALL AGILITY SHORTCUTS FIXED!
[]WHEN YOUR STUNNED OR FROZEN YOU CANT USE SHORTCUT.
[]F SHORTKEYS!(F1-F9)
[]Starteritem 1 per computer
[]starteritem 5 per ip
[]you cannot trade yourself
[]you cannot fight yourself
[*]Muiling is not aloud![/ul]

[ul][]3 SECOND DELAY FOR NON SKULL
[]10 SECOND DELAY FOR SKULL[/ul]

[ul][]Protect 2 combat skills.
[]All skiller skills are protected.[/ul]

[ul][*]IN COMBAT DROPPING NOT ALOUD![/ul]

Custom Skilling Pets:

[ul][]-Woodcutting
[]-Smithing
[]-Firemaking
[]-Cooking
[]-Herblore
[]-Prayer[/ul]

Custom Npc Drop pets:

[ul][]Dwarf

[]Blue dragon

[]More to come![/ul]

[ul][]Kill Death Counter.
[]Clue scroll counter.
[]Santa Event
[]x50 Exp Rate
[]Target Training for combat and range.
[]Protect skills at nurse Sarah
[]safe Deposit box is at Niles.
[]Rules that will be changed upon time, example: if clans will become a problem we will do something about it.
[]Using Database for all players info!
[]Auto Backup every day!
[]You can hold up 4 Keys.
[]when skulled and more then 2 keys announcement will be made.[/ul]
